Gender: Unisex | Size run: 35 46
Upper: Canvas RAW | Outsole: Rubber Hng dn chn size
Ch i hng 1 ln duy nht, mong bn cn nhc k trc khi quyt nh.
Thi hn i sn phm khi mua trc tip ti ca hng l 07 ngy, k t ngy mua. i sn phm khi mua online l 14 ngy, k t ngy nhn hng.
Sn phm i phi km ha n. Bt buc phi cn nguyn tem, hp, nhn mc.
Sn phm i khng c du hiu qua s dng, khng git ty, bm bn, bin dng.
Ananas ch u tin h tr i size. Trong trng hp sn phm ht size cn i, bn c th i sang 01 sn phm khc:
- Nu sn phm mun i ngang gi tr hoc c gi tr cao hn, bn s cn b khong chnh lch ti thi im i (nu c).
- Nu bn mong mun i sn phm c gi tr thp hn, chng ti s khng hon li tin.
Trong trng hp sn phm - size bn mun i khng cn hng trong h thng. Vui lng chn sn phm khc.
Khng hon tr bng tin mt d bt c trong trng hp no. Mong bn thng cm.
Mi i giy Ananas trc khi xut xng u tri qua nhiu khu kim tra. Tuy vy, trong qu trnh s dng, nu nhn thy cc li: gy , h , t ch may,...trong thi gian 6 thng t ngy mua hng, mong bn sm gi sn phm v Ananas nhm gip chng ti c c hi phc v bn tt hn. Vui lng gi sn phm v bt k ca hng Ananas no, hoc gi n trung tm bo hnh Ananas ngay trong trung tm TP.HCM trong gi hnh chnh:
a ch: 5C Tn Cng, P.25, Q.Bnh Thnh , TP. H Ch Minh. Hotline: 028 2211 0067
